metadata.title: Honorary Visiting Research Fellows
metadata.description: List of Honorary Visiting Research Fellows

data.name: Prof. Nandana Rajatheva
designations: Head of Broadband Connectivity with Intelligence Group, Faculty of Information Technology and Electrical, Engineering, University of Oulu, Finland
remarks: Double Degree Program CWC, University of Peradeniya.

data.name: Prof. Gyu Myoung Lee
designations: Professor, School of Computer Science and Mathematics, Liverpool John Moores University, UK
Adjunct Professor, KAIST Institute for IT Convergence, Korea
ITU-T SG13 WP3 Chair, Q16/13 and Q4/20 Rapporteur
ITU-T FG-AN Vice-chair, FGAI4A Vice-chair, CG-AIoT Convener
remarks: Distinguished Collaborator of Cryptography Research Laboratory (CRL).
Featured in the Hanthana Vision Research Magazine of the University of Peradeniya, Vol 7, Issue 1, in June 2021.
Featured in the Newsletter of the IEEE Computer Society Sri Lanka Chapter, Vol 1, Issue 1, in December 2021.

data.name: Dr. Hasindu Gamaarachchi
designations: Genomics Computing Research Scientist in the Genomic Technologies Group
Conjoint Lecturer, School of Computer Science & Engineering, UNSW Sydney
remarks: Undergraduate, Former Instructor and Former Temperory Lecturer in Department of Computer Engineering.
Former Resource Person, NVIDIA Research Center, University of Peradeniya.

data.name: Dr. Vajira Thambawita
designations: Research Scientist at Simula Metropoliton Center for Digital Engineering
remarks: Former Instructor in Department of Computer Engineering, UoP.
Former Visiting Lecturer in University of Uwa Wellassa.

data.name: Dr. Titus Jayarathna
designations: Biomedical Engineer in Residence at The MARCS Institute for Brain, Behaviour and Development Penrith, New South Wales, Australia
Casual Academic at Westren Sydney University
remarks: Former Temporary Lecturer, Instructor, and Undergraduate in the Department of Computer Engineering, UoP.
Former Vice President, ACES, UoP, Sri Lanka.

data.name: Dr. Iftekhar Salam
designations: Assistant Professor, Department of Information and Communication Technology, Xiamen University Malaysia, Malaysia
remarks: Project supervisor of the final year project of Madushan K. H. G. H.(E/16/217) about Implementation of Lightweight Cryptographic Algorithms.

data.name: Dr. Hiranya Jayakodi
remarks: Former Undergraduate in Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, UoP.
Finalist IEEE International Future Energy Challenge. Winner IESL Undergraduate Inventor of the Year (Group Thesis).

data.name: Dr. Rajitha Navarathna
designations: Principle Data Scientist, OCTAVE - John Keells Group, Sri Lanka
remarks: Undergraduate, former Instructor, and a former Temperory Lecturer in the Department of Computer Engineering.
Former Senior Lecturer (Research) in Asia Pacific Institute of Information Technology, Sri Lanka.
